metadata.name: Face In A Crowd
metadata.description:
"Face In A Crowd" is the culmination of 50 years of exploring the depths of human consciousness. Deep textures, swirling colors, and abstract splattering techniques define this exclusive piece. Stunning reds, solid white, and luminous greens dance on canvas revealing a shadowy profile of an unknown entity. "Face In A Crowd" challenges the psyche, which Burt loved to do.  

Burt Goldman, known as "The American Monk"  was a meditation master, dedicating his life to healing and spiritual fulfillment. 

Author of the best-selling book and mind-enhancement program "Quantum Jumping", which outlines a revolutionary method of accessing alternative realities via deep meditation. The process unlocks talents possessed by alternate versions of ourselves, which live in an infinite number of parallel universes. 

Brad Wilson presents "Face In A Crowd" in homage to his dear friend, mentor, and master Burt Goldman. 

This piece was the genesis mint on the PRISM NFT Marketplace.
